column1: Cloverleaf is a census-designated place (CDP) in east central Harris County
Cloverleaf originated as a stop on the Beaumont
column3: and Western Railway. A 1936 county highway map indicates an unnamed development that became Cloverleaf. The Handbook of Texas states that a post office may have existed for a short period of time around 1950. In 1990

column1: Cloverleaf is zoned to schools in the Galena Park Independent School District.Elementary schools in the Cloverleaf CDP include Cloverleaf Elementary School
column5: and North Shore Elementary School. All residents are zoned to Cobb 6th Grade School
column6: which is located outside the CDP. Most residents are zoned to North Shore Middle School
